'''Welfare Meal''' is a [[Consumable]] that can be obtained once per day from [[Bran]]. Using it gives one [[Fortune Slip (Fontaine)|Fortune Slip]] and one food item out of the following:

* [[Barbeque Ribs]]
* [[Coffee Bavarois]]
* [[Fish and Chips]]
* [[Fontainian Onion Soup]]
* [[Garlic Baguette]]
* [[Haggis]]
* [[Lasagna]]
* [[Mint Jelly]]
* [[Mint Salad]]
* [[Minty Bean Soup]]
* [[Poisson Seafood Soup]]
* [[Pop's Teas]]
* [[Steak]]
* [[Tasses Ragout]]
* [[Teyvat Fried Egg]]
* [[Trout Amandine]]

The food item may be of Delicious, Normal, or Suspicious Quality.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Unused Welfare Meals left in the inventory will disappear upon the daily reset.
* Obtaining a twice-lucky fortune slip will grant the {{Achievement|Thanks For Your Patronage!}}.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A complimentary dish provided by the Coupon Cafeteria in the Fortress of Meropide. Normally, one person can receive one free meal full of surprises per day. This is the sole thing at the Fortress where full equality need not be bought with Coupons.|[[Map]] description}}
